sentences.sContent: Several years ago I received a post card from a friend in Jackson Hole, Wyo., who wrote, " I am skiing with abandon!"
sentences.sContent_eng: Several years ago I received a post card from a friend in Jackson Hole, Wyo., who wrote, " I am skiing with abandon!"
sentences.sCn: 几年前，我收到一个在怀俄明州杰克逊霍尔的朋友寄给我的明信片，上面写道：“我正在尽情的滑雪！”

sentences.sContent: My Christmas present is a post card. There is a lovely panda in it.
sentences.sContent_eng: My Christmas present is a post card. There is a lovely panda in it.
sentences.sCn: 我的圣诞节礼物是一张明信片，上面有一只可爱的熊猫。

remMethod.val: post(邮递)+card(卡片)→邮递的卡片→明信片

trans.tranOther: A postcard is a thin card, often with a picture on one side, which you can write on and mail to people without using an envelope
